summary: This document appears to be a consent form from a client of Deutsche Bank Wealth Management, authorizing the bank to send various financial materials electronically. It outlines the terms of electronic communication and the responsibilities of the client regarding their email address and consent.
keyFacts: The document is a consent form for electronic delivery of financial materials from Deutsche Bank Wealth Management.
It specifies that certain offerings are only available for purchase outside the United States.
The client must notify Deutsche Bank of any changes to their email address or facsimile number.
The document emphasizes that electronic delivery constitutes delivery to all parties involved if signed as Joint Tenants or Tenants in Common.
There are multiple references to Deutsche Bank's affiliates and subsidiaries involved in the wealth management services.
